class.rdfs:comment: Intended audience for an item, i.e. the group for whom the item was created.
class.rdfs:label: Audience

schema:audienceType.rdfs:comment: The target group associated with a given audience (e.g. veterans, car owners, musicians, etc.).
schema:audienceType.rdfs:label: audienceType

schema:geographicArea.rdfs:comment: The geographic area associated with the audience.
schema:geographicArea.rdfs:label: geographicArea
